item.title: [Resolved] Intermittent CDN availability issues
item.description: Earlier today, increased edge traffic caused caching proxy nodes to run out of disk space, causing intermittent CDN availability issues. Disk space has been freed manually and the service restored. (14:43 UTC — Sep 7)
item.content: Earlier today, increased edge traffic caused caching proxy nodes to run out of disk space, causing intermittent CDN availability issues. Disk space has been freed manually and the service restored. (14:43 UTC — Sep 7)
